title: nikitonium
author: nikitonium
content: Our Vision For Nikito Is To Craft A Graceful And Potent Experience For Positive, Connected, And Maybe Even Enchanting Interactions Between The Physical And Metaverse Realms, A World Where Both Realms Are Explored And Expanded To Their Fullest, Coexisting Harmoniously As Significant Complements. The Power Of $NIKI Pushes This Notion To Its Utmost Edge, Encompassing Vast Scope, Scale, Diversity, And Opulence. It Embodies The Infinite Realms We Are Poised To Forge, Brimming With Limitless Imagination, Richness, And Variety.More info : https://nikitonium.com$NIKI SpecificationCoin Symbol: NIKIAlgorithm : GhostRiderReward: 5,000 NIKIMax Supply: 21,000,000,000 NIKIBlock Time: 2 MinuteSmartnode Collateral: 900,000 NIKIReward DistributionsMiner : 40%Smartnode : 50%Development : 10%NIKITO Wallet:Windows : https://github.com/nikitonium/nikito/releases/download/2.0.2.3/windows-nikito-2.0.2.3.zipUbuntu : https://github.com/nikitonium/nikito/releases/download/2.0.2.3/ubuntu-nikito-2.0.2.3.tar.gzJoin Our Discord : https://discord.gg/QFSvSuvgGq

comments.author: MMOStars
comments.body: FYI likely malware. When goal is directly linking to binaries, that's when you know it's likely not gonna end well.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: MMOStars on November 07, 2023, 12:16:38 PMFYI likely malware. When goal is directly linking to binaries, that's when you know it's likely not gonna end well. Why do you think it's malware? Do you have any reason to make that claim? I'm not defending anyone, but I believe that in order to accuse someone, you have to have some facts that it is malware. Can you provide any hard evidence to support what you are saying?
